page.title: 02LAND USE - AGRICULTURE
page.content: Delamere/Eddisbury {LAND USE-AGRICULTURAL DAIRY FARMING There are two large dairy farms in the area. Lower Longley Farm{ This farm covers about 125 acres.It has 75 dairy cows with a yield of approx.5500ltrs per cow p.a.It also has 40 young stock.The farmer grows potatoes & has some grassland covering.His family have been at the farm for about 60 years,& the farm is worked by the farmer & one employee.This farm used to be the Home farm to Parrs Estate.(The Parrs were a banking family from Warrington).In 1923 the estate was sold & parcels of land were portioned off.
